sentences.sentence: The value of Japan increase with steady steps between 2010 and 2015, then it decrease greatly by 2016; while America, China and India increase with steady steps between 2010 and 2016.

sentences.sentence: The value of Japan increase with steady steps between 2010 and 2015, then it decrease greatly by 2016; while America, China and India increase with steady steps between 2010 and 2016.
